tool.name: Poretools stats
tool.description: Extract raw stat from the base called fast5
tool.help:
usage: poretools stats [-h] [-q] [--type STRING] [--full-tsv] [--group GROUP] FILES [FILES ...]
positional arguments: FILES The input FAST5 files.
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -q, --quiet Do not output warnings to stderr --type STRING Which type of FASTQ entries should be reported? Def.=all --full-tsv Verbose output in tab-separated format. --group GROUP Base calling group serial number to extract, default 000
